Name: Moe: The Boundary of Reality
About the game: Moe is a 3D story-driven adventure-platformer with unique wonderful world, breathtaking atmosphere and fun fast-paced action. MAIN FEATURES Fun movement mechanics, that you can use in unique environments and engaging platformer-like puzzles. Exciting combat , where you can use a variety of abilities, weapons and meet extraordinary opponents. 'Reality Break' , use the powers to manipulate the existence of this world - create temporary objects to use in puzzles and combat. Progress , your abilities and skills in simple but emergent parts of gameplay.
